participant_1.background:
My brother thinks he is a viking.
My masters degree is in italian literature.
I live in a nice attic apartment in portland or.
I have a pet skunk.

participant_2.background:
I am an american citizen.
I love pizza.
Going to the beach is my favorite past time.
My son is a football player.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love going to the beach and playing football. What about you?
I like to read and cook. I have a pet skunk.
That's cool! I've always wanted a pet skunk. What's it like having one?
He's a great pet. He's very friendly and loves to play.
That sounds cute! I'm glad you enjoy him.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about being an American citizen?
I have a lot of favorite things about being an American citizen. I love the freedom of speech and the right to bear arms.
I agree! I love those things too. What's your favorite pizza?
I love all pizza, but my favorite is probably pepperoni with extra cheese.
That's a classic! I like to order pizza from a local pizza place.
Me too! I love supporting local businesses.
I'm glad we agree on so many things! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! It's been nice talking to you too.
